statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 6 \, x + 8 , 5 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 2 \, x - 3 , 4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 2 , 12 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x - 2 , -2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
